ru.spb.iac.cud.sts.core.auth

Class CUDSAML2STSLoginModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • SAMLTokenFromHttpRequestAbstractLoginModule
      • ru.spb.iac.cud.sts.core.auth.CUDSAML2STSCommonLoginModule
        • ru.spb.iac.cud.sts.core.auth.CUDSAML2STSLoginModule

  • public class CUDSAML2STSLoginModule
extends CUDSAML2STSCommonLoginModule

    This LoginModule implements the local validation of SAML assertions on AS7. The specified localValidationSecurityDomain property must correspond to a AS7 JSSE domain that configures a truststore and a server-alias that identifies the certificate used to validate the assertions.
